Articles.Content: I am going to request a "restore to defaults" for each of the settings page, especially key binds.
While it's not the most finely-tuned way to do it, you can (for now, if need be) delete the settings.cfg file in order to force KSP to regenerate it with the default settings.

uhm, after one click's "IVA"... how does one get out of the cockpit view? what button do I push to return to the Staging point of view?

the details like this keep making it hard for me to really get into this game.

another "its only obvious" question: if I have a survey mission out at say "slartbartifast's pinnacle tableau" how could I fly to that point if the only clue I can manage to get is a lime green clip board on the nav ball? is there another way to "know where to go?"

"C" or "V"

As to the survey missions, if you have them marked on your navball (using the Navigation feature you get when clicking on the icons in Map mode), the game will display a "Now Entering XXXX Region" on the screen so you know you're in the right place.
